alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:44PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade, southeastern Lawrence and central Pennington Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 243 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nemo, or 13 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Meade, southeastern Lawrence and central Pennington Counties, near Johnson Siding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
